title:
Attending the 38th Annual - American Indian Film Festival

attachments.displayName:
Attending the 38th Annual - American Indian Film Festival
Last night attending AIFI's Delancey Street Theatre Screening: 'The Activist'.
I was able to meet Sacheen Littlefeather, who in 1973 refused the acceptance of Marlo Brando Academy Award. Here we are 40 years later and Cyril Morin, Director of 'The Activist' meets Sacheen. Ron Rogge is the actor next to me. Link to: Sacheen Academy Award Ceremony:
Marlon Brando's Oscar® win for " The Godfather"

object.content:
Attending the 38th Annual - American Indian Film Festival
Last night attending AIFI's Delancey Street Theatre Screening: 'The Activist'.
I was able to meet Sacheen Littlefeather, who in 1973 refused the acceptance of Marlo Brando Academy Award. Here we are 40 years later and Cyril Morin, Director of 'The Activist' meets Sacheen. Ron Rogge is the actor next to me. Link to: Sacheen Academy Award Ceremony:
Marlon Brando's Oscar® win for " The Godfather"
